nodes.text: Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Complete Visual Companion

Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Complete Visual Companion is a hardcover compendium that collects two previously published reference titles, Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary by Pablo Hidalgo and Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Incredible Cross-Sections by Jason Fry. It was released by DK Publishing in 2016.

The book's front cover features Kylo Ren wielding his lightsaber, which readers can "ignite" via a press-button light module. The book also includes an exclusive limited-edition print of the Millennium Falcon from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
